string.value: Ken, who you met in the ruins of the city in the year 2216, requests that you investigate the eastern regions where he received a rescue signal. You must hurry and find the person who he suspects to be a teenage female. Begin your search right away.

Ken, whom you met in the ruins of the city in year 2216, requested that you investigate the eastern regions where he received a rescue signal. You found a teenage female who appeared to be passed out from exhaustion. Fortunately, she was conscious when you talked to her.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 50,000\r\nCan participate in the "What Was That I Saw?" quest.\r\n
I'm glad you came. I received a request for help, but I can't detect the exact location. We have to dispatch a search party, and I need you to lead it.
Okay. The signal is coming from east, and we suspect the victim is a teenage female. Please investigate the eastern regions and let me know as soon as you find someone.
Somebody's life depends on this. We don't have time to sit and wait around!
Help! Help me! Are you here to rescue me?
Thank you. I've drained all my energy, but I'm hanging in there. I didn't think anyone would ever get here. I was so scared.
Please search the eastern regions and let me know as soon as you find someone.
